BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 070259Z JUL
   BY M/V OCEAN EUROPE AND M/V SANCO STAR
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-11.22S 040-27.45W, 22-25.70S 040-37.38W,
   22-34.88S 040-21.90W, 22-20.40S 040-11.97W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 070359Z JUL.
